channel.title: [PI] Character Int not saving

item.title: [PI] Character Int not saving
item.dc:creator: @webwebwebby webwebwebby
item.description:
@webwebwebby wrote:

My problem:

Amount resets back to 0 when someone logs out.

My Code:

Player.class:

playerSave.class:

else if (token.equals("voting-Points")) { p.votePoints = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

Also:

characterfile.write("Vote-Points = ", 0, 14); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.votePoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.votePoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

More info:

I have added numerous amount of different point systems and this one and 2 others are the only ones that are giving me trouble. ANY INFORMATION will be helpful!

Thanks in advance -Steve
